thread.title: Student Allegedly Kills Parents at Central Michigan University

author: Melissa Korn
title: Student Allegedly Kills Parents at Central Michigan University
text:
A student at Central Michigan University allegedly shot and killed his mother and police-officer father in a dormitory Friday morning.
Central Michigan University said early Saturday morning that police apprehended the student, identified as 19-year-old James Eric Davis Jr. That followed an hourslong manhunt during which the campus was locked down.
